entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
